pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========================================sparksampling========================================``sparksampling`` is a PySpark-based sampling and data quality assessment GRPC service that supports containerized deployments and Spark on K8SFeature========================================- Common sampling methods: Random, Stratified, Simple- Relationship Sampling based on DAG and Topological sorting- Cloud Native and Spark on K8S support========================================QUICK START========================================Installation========================================The trial only requires direct installation using pypi``pip install sparksampling``run as``sparksampling``The service will start and listen on port 8530Docker========================================``docker run -p 8530:8530 wh1isper/pysparksampling:latest``========================================MORE========================================For more, see our github page: https://github.com/Wh1isper/pyspark-sampling/
